scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana
description: An insurance scheme offering life insurance cover for death due to any reason. It is a one-year cover, renewable from year to year.
benefits: PMJJBY offers one- year term life cover of ₹ 2.00 Lakh to all the subscribers in the age group of 18-50 years.
It covers death due to any reason.
Premium payable is ₹ 436/- per annum per subscriber, to be auto debited from the subscriber’s bank/post office account.
eligibility: The age of the applicant must be between 18 to 50 Years.
The applicant must hold an individual bank / post office account.
